00053 void RainbruRPG::Core::Version::logVersion(){
00054   string m;
00055 
00056   std::ostringstream ostr;
00057     
00058   ostr <<endl <<endl << appName << " v" <<version << "-"
00059        << build << " using :" << endl 
00060        << " - FOX-Toolkit v"
00061        << FOX_MAJOR << "."
00062        << FOX_MINOR << "."
00063        << FOX_LEVEL << endl 
00064        << " - Ogre3D v"
00065        << OGRE_VERSION_MAJOR << "." << OGRE_VERSION_MINOR 
00066        << "." << OGRE_VERSION_PATCH << " (" 
00067        << OGRE_VERSION_NAME<< ")"<< endl 
00068        << " - CEGUI v"
00069        << CEGUI_VERSION_MAJOR << "." << CEGUI_VERSION_MINOR 
00070        << "." << CEGUI_VERSION_PATCH << endl;
00071   
00072   Logger::getSingleton().logMessage( ostr.str() );
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076   m="Copyright (C) 2006 Jerome PASQUIER";
00077   Logger::getSingleton().logMessage(m.c_str());
00078   
00079   m="RainbruRPG comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. This is free software,";
00080   Logger::getSingleton().logMessage(m.c_str());
00081   
00082   m="and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.";
00083   Logger::getSingleton().logMessage(m.c_str());
00084   
00085   m="See the GNU General Public License for more details.";
00086   Logger::getSingleton().logMessage(m.c_str());
00087 
00088 }
